actions.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 1067, an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 116-60, modified by the amendment printed in part A of House Report 116-461 is adopted.
purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 1067, an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 116-60, modified by the amendment printed in part A of House Report 116-461 is adopted.
